tours.title: 2-day/1-night Tour
tours.description: Experience an unforgettable 2-day trek on Mount Rinjani with a night under the stars.

tours.title: 3-day/2-night Tour
tours.description: An intensive 3-day trek on Mount Rinjani with two nights under the stars, perfect for adventure seekers.

guide.name: Fiki Santoso
guide.bio: Fiki is an experienced trekking guide with over 10 years of experience on Mount Rinjani. He knows every path and loves to share his passion for nature with others.
qualifications: Fluent in English and Bahasa Indonesia

testimonials.name: Anna MÃ¼ller
testimonials.quote: The tour with Fiki was an unforgettable experience! He is very professional and knows the mountain like the back of his hand.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.quote: Fiki is a great guide! His knowledge and friendly demeanor made the trek a highlight of my vacation.
